ds:DataSource.ds:Query: select distinct req.request_type_id typeId ,decode(req.work_mode, 2, 'True', 'False') remote --,req.applicant_ip ip --,pkzi.pkzi_name AS pkzi ,build.description AS address from hrd.request_hdr req --JOIN hrd.register_pkzi pkzi ON (pkzi.user_id = req.applicant_id) left JOIN obd_sys.user_location loc ON (loc.user_id = req.applicant_id) left JOIN hrd.dict_room room ON (room.room_id = loc.room_id) left JOIN hrd.building build ON (build.building_id = room.building_id) WHERE req.request_hdr_id = :0 --AND SYSDATE BETWEEN pkzi.begin_date AND pkzi.end_date
ds:DataSource.ds:Collection: select attr.request_attr_hdr_id AS attr_id, pty.value_number || pty.value_varchar2 || pty.value_date || decode(pty.value_boolean, 0, 'Нет', 1, 'Да', null) || pty.value_clob AS attr_value from hrd.request_attr_hdr attr join hrd.request_attr_hdr cat on (attr.p_request_attr_hdr_id = cat.request_attr_hdr_id) join hrd.request_attr_types typ on (attr.request_attr_hdr_id = typ.request_attr_hdr_id) join hrd.request_hdr req on (req.request_type_id = typ.request_type_id) -- Позволяет выбирать атрибуты заявки из hrd.request_attr_hdr -- без какого-либо значения из hrd.request_attr_pty left outer join hrd.request_attr_pty pty on (pty.request_attr_hdr_id = attr.request_attr_hdr_id AND pty.request_hdr_id = req.request_hdr_id) where req.request_hdr_id = :0 order by typ.order_number
ds:DataSource.ds:Query: select pkzi.pkzi_name AS alt_pkzi from hrd.register_pkzi pkzi where pkzi.full_name = :0 AND SYSDATE BETWEEN pkzi.begin_date AND pkzi.end_date

select distinct sys.register_id systemId, LISTAGG(res.name, chr(13) || chr(10)) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY res.name) AS resources, CASE MAX(acc.action) WHEN 0 THEN 'False' ELSE 'True' END AS allow, CASE WHEN MAX(acc.action) = MIN(acc.action) THEN 'False' ELSE 'True' END AS change, CASE MIN(acc.action) WHEN 0 THEN 'True' ELSE 'False' END AS deny from hrd.request_hdr req JOIN hrd.it_access_right_request acc ON (acc.request_hdr_id = req.request_hdr_id) JOIN hrd.it_access_right_hdr rit ON (rit.access_right_hdr_id = acc.access_right_hdr_id) JOIN hrd.it_dict_information_resource res ON (res.information_resource_id = rit.object_id) JOIN hrd.it_dict_information_system sys ON (sys.information_system_id = res.information_system_id) where req.request_hdr_id = :0 GROUP BY sys.register_id

ds:Table.name: res
ds:Table.ds:For: select distinct res.information_resource_id, res.name as name, CASE MAX(acc.action) WHEN 0 THEN 'False' ELSE 'True' END AS allow, CASE WHEN MAX(acc.action) = MIN(acc.action) THEN 'False' ELSE 'True' END AS change, CASE MIN(acc.action) WHEN 0 THEN 'True' ELSE 'False' END AS deny from hrd.it_dict_information_resource res JOIN hrd.it_access_right_hdr rit ON (rit.object_id = res.information_resource_id) JOIN hrd.it_access_right_request acc ON (acc.access_right_hdr_id = rit.access_right_hdr_id) JOIN hrd.request_hdr req ON (req.request_hdr_id = acc.request_hdr_id) where req.request_hdr_id = :0 group by res.information_resource_id, res.name
ds:Table.ds:Get: select --rit.res_name, rit.res_id as id, rit.name as name, rit.access_right_hdr_id as key, acc.end_date as expire, decode(acc.action, 1, 'True', 'False') allow, decode(acc.action, 0, 'True', 'False') deny from ( select res.name as res_name, res.information_resource_id as res_id, rit.name, rit.access_right_hdr_id from hrd.it_access_right_hdr rit join hrd.it_dict_information_resource res ON (res.information_resource_id = rit.object_id) where rit.object_id = :0 and rit.request_available = 1 ) rit left join ( select acc.action, acc.access_right_hdr_id, acc.end_date from hrd.it_access_right_hdr rit JOIN hrd.it_dict_information_resource res ON (res.information_resource_id = rit.object_id) JOIN hrd.it_access_right_request acc ON (acc.access_right_hdr_id = rit.access_right_hdr_id) JOIN hrd.request_hdr req ON (req.request_hdr_id = acc.request_hdr_id) where req.request_hdr_id = :1 ) acc on (rit.access_right_hdr_id = acc.access_right_hdr_id) order by rit.access_right_hdr_id
